It's not only the Red Army."},{"lineNumber":24826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、親衛隊も前進！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, the Guards advance as well!\""},{"lineNumber":24827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「付いて来れてない者も出てきてますわ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are those who can't keep up,"},{"lineNumber":24828,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レイラ隊長！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Captain Leila!\""},{"lineNumber":24829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「脱落者は後で合流！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stragglers will regroup later!"},{"lineNumber":24830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は、ただただ進むしかないわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"For now, we only have to keep moving forward!\""},{"lineNumber":24831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我々もそのつもりです！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is exactly our intention!"},{"lineNumber":24832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　脱落者はこちらで回収しますゆえ、","translatedEnglishLine":"We will recover the stragglers here,"},{"lineNumber":24833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は前に！」","translatedEnglishLine":"for now, forward!\""},{"lineNumber":24834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、アアアアアァァァッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-Aaaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":24835,"originalJapaneseLine":"侵攻するリーザス軍の意気を代弁するかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if to embody the advancing spirit of the Leazas army,"},{"lineNumber":24836,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックは疾走する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick dashed forward."},{"lineNumber":24837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待てい、人間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, human!\""},{"lineNumber":24838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............!\" (silence or tense pause)"},{"lineNumber":24839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我こそは魔軍一の使い手、剣豪様より","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am the demon army's top master, bestowed the name"},{"lineNumber":24840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ムラクモの名を賜った者！","translatedEnglishLine":"Murakumo by the sword master himself!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、騒々しい！　何があった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's all this noise! What happened!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叱責され、幾度か深呼吸で息を整えてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After being scolded and taking a few deep breaths to regain composure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝令は改めて、深刻そのものの表情で言葉を放った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The messenger spoke again with a thoroughly serious expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「て……敵軍が！　敵の大軍が、現れました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-the enemy army! A huge enemy force has appeared!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、我々は……包囲されつつあります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-we are... being surrounded!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バラオ山麓、マウネスの郊外――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the foot of Mount Balao, on the outskirts of Maunes—
"Ra, tsu――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――アアアアアァァァァァァッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "――Aaaaaaahhhhhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごぶっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gobu!" (grunt/cough)
"Ka, ...!" (grunt, strained sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朱い剣閃が、残光を引いて戦場を切り裂いていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scarlet flash of sword drew a lingering light, slicing through the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次、ッ……！　オオオオオオォォォッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Next...! Ooooooooh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将でありながら指揮の声を上げることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though a general, without raising a command voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い死神はただただ、敵を斬りながら先頭を往く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Red Reaper simply cut down enemies while leading the front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、自らがすべき事を、自分も部下も理解している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, both he and his subordinates understood exactly what needed to be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう認識しての、周囲を見ぬ突撃だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With that recognition, he charged forward without looking around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、ひいいいい！？　な、なんだこいつら！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hii, hiiiii!? Wh-what are these guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでこんな所に、人間どもが……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are humans here in a place like this...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、囲め！　回り込んで、脇から……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, surround them! Flank from the sides...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前へ！　リック将軍から、距離を離さず！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Forward! Stay close to General Rick!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの後背に回ろうとした魔物兵を切り捨て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cutting down the demon soldiers who tried to get behind Rick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将メナドが声を上げ、差し招く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vice Commander Menado raised his voice and beckoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに剣戟の音と咆哮で応え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Answering with clashing swords and roaring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類最強の兵団――――リーザス第三軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strongest human army—the Leazas Third Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通称赤の軍が魔軍を蹂躙していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nicknamed the Red Army, ravaged the demon forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僚友の背後を守る、等という思想はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no concept of guarding comrades' backs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の敵は突撃する者が斬り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who charged cut down the enemies in front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の敵は後続が斬る。それだけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the rest were cut down by those following behind. That was all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、おお、おいぃぃっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, oh, hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってんだ！　リーザス軍はまるごと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's going on!? The entire Leazas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフ様の本隊と戦ってるはずじゃ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: should be fighting Lord Yoshif's main force...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「伏兵だのって数じゃねえぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This isn't some mere ambush force!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかもこいつら、あの赤鎧の……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And these guys, that red armored one...!"
"Gubeh..." (gagging sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おあいにく様。赤の軍だけじゃないのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry to disappoint you. It's not only the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、親衛隊も前進！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, the Guards advance as well!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「付いて来れてない者も出てきてますわ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are those who can't keep up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ隊長！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain Leila!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「脱落者は後で合流！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stragglers will regroup later!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、ただただ進むしかないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, we only have to keep moving forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々もそのつもりです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is exactly our intention!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱落者はこちらで回収しますゆえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will recover the stragglers here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は前に！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for now, forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、アアアアアァァァッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-Aaaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵攻するリーザス軍の意気を代弁するかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if to embody the advancing spirit of the Leazas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは疾走する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick dashed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待てい、人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, human!"
"............!" (silence or tense pause)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我こそは魔軍一の使い手、剣豪様より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the demon army's top master, bestowed the name

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムラクモの名を賜った者！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Murakumo by the sword master himself!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叱責され、幾度か深呼吸で息を整えてから、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごぶっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gobu!" (grunt/cough)
"Ka, ...!" (grunt, strained sound)

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scarlet flash of sword drew a lingering light, slicing through the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次、ッ……！　オオオオオオォォォッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Next...! Ooooooooh!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though a general, without raising a command voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い死神はただただ、敵を斬りながら先頭を往く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Red Reaper simply cut down enemies while leading the front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、自らがすべき事を、自分も部下も理解している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, both he and his subordinates understood exactly what needed to be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう認識しての、周囲を見ぬ突撃だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With that recognition, he charged forward without looking around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、ひいいいい！？　な、なんだこいつら！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hii, hiiiii!? Wh-what are these guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでこんな所に、人間どもが……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are humans here in a place like this...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、囲め！　回り込んで、脇から……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, surround them! Flank from the sides...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前へ！　リック将軍から、距離を離さず！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Forward! Stay close to General Rick!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックの後背に回ろうとした魔物兵を切り捨て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cutting down the demon soldiers who tried to get behind Rick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将メナドが声を上げ、差し招く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vice Commander Menado raised his voice and beckoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに剣戟の音と咆哮で応え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Answering with clashing swords and roaring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類最強の兵団――――リーザス第三軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strongest human army—the Leazas Third Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通称赤の軍が魔軍を蹂躙していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nicknamed the Red Army, ravaged the demon forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僚友の背後を守る、等という思想はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no concept of guarding comrades' backs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の敵は突撃する者が斬り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who charged cut down the enemies in front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外の敵は後続が斬る。それだけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the rest were cut down by those following behind. That was all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、おお、おいぃぃっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, oh, hey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってんだ！　リーザス軍はまるごと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's going on!? The entire Leazas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフ様の本隊と戦ってるはずじゃ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: should be fighting Lord Yoshif's main force...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「伏兵だのって数じゃねえぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This isn't some mere ambush force!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかもこいつら、あの赤鎧の……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And these guys, that red armored one...!"
"Gubeh..." (gagging sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おあいにく様。赤の軍だけじゃないのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry to disappoint you. It's not only the Red Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、親衛隊も前進！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, the Guards advance as well!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「付いて来れてない者も出てきてますわ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are those who can't keep up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ隊長！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain Leila!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「脱落者は後で合流！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stragglers will regroup later!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、ただただ進むしかないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, we only have to keep moving forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々もそのつもりです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is exactly our intention!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱落者はこちらで回収しますゆえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will recover the stragglers here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は前に！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for now, forward!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、アアアアアァァァッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-Aaaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵攻するリーザス軍の意気を代弁するかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if to embody the advancing spirit of the Leazas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは疾走する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick dashed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待てい、人間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, human!"
"............!" (silence or tense pause)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我こそは魔軍一の使い手、剣豪様より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the demon army's top master, bestowed the name

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムラクモの名を賜った者！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Murakumo by the sword master himself!"
